Reviews.Title: Simple
Reviews.Author: Trent Enu
Reviews.Content: Way simple to install, comes with everything needed. Picture is descend, note for indoors only. Plastic housing and not sealed

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Pieces Indoor Dome Surveillance Cameras
COMS sensor with IR Cut Filter;NTSC format
24 infrared LEDs for night vision of 50ft
700 TV Lines. Small size, discreet installation
Extension Cables, power supply and splitter cable included
ProductInfo.Name: 4*C3010DP7 Defeway 700TV Lines Dome Indoor 24IR Leds Security Surveillance Cameras
